EmailTemplate.description: Email to fellow to notify that their application has been received. US fellows.
EmailTemplate.name: Application Received - US
EmailTemplate.subject: Climate Corps Application Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Fellow_Application__c.Applicant_First_Name__c},
Thank you for submitting an application for Climate Corps! We have received your completed application and will be in touch in mid- to late January. For more information about our recruitment timeline, please visit our website.
You may log back into the portal at any time to update your contact information and resume, and to see the status of your application in the top right-hand corner. Follow this link to log in: https://edfcommunity.force.com/EDFCCFellowPortal/s/login
Best,
The Climate Corps Team
edfclimatecorps.apply@edf.org
EDFClimateCorps.org
